DOC.brief_summary: The ADHOC Cohort comprise 3044 DM individual , treat 47 CHS primary care clinic , underwent haptoglobin genotyping 2 march , 2005 26 September 2006 . Hypothesis : strict glucose control ( HbA1c < 7 % ) reduce rate cardiovascular event diabetic patient Hp 2-2 phenotype .
